At Green Orbit Digital, we help organisations operating at the intersection of space, sustainability, and technology transform marketing into measurable impact.

Our capabilities combine creative strategy, data intelligence, and sustainability insights to enable growth that is responsible, measurable, and scientifically grounded.

1. Sustainable & Digital Marketing

Empower your brand to engage audiences ethically, efficiently, and sustainably.

Key Capabilities

  • Sustainable Campaign Design â€“ Optimise campaigns for low-carbon footprint and high engagement.
  • Green Content Frameworks â€“ Purpose-driven messaging aligned with UN SDGs.
  • Digital Efficiency Audits â€“ Measure and reduce emissions from web, social, and paid media.

  • Low-Impact Web & SEO â€“ Build accessible, eco-efficient websites.
  • Behavioural Impact Campaigns â€“ Use data-driven storytelling to shift awareness and drive sustainable action.

Tech Stack

  • Marketing Automation & CRM: HubSpot, WordPress (Headless CMS)
  • Analytics & Reporting: Google Analytics 4, Power BI, Looker Studio, Tableau
  • Content & Design: Canva, Figma
  • AI & Automation: Python, Zapier, Hammerspoon

Outcomes

  • Reduced digital emissions
  • Stronger brand purpose alignment
  • Higher engagement and conversion efficiency

2. Earth Observation Insights

Turn satellite and environmental data into actionable intelligence for strategy, storytelling, and sustainability.

Key Capabilities

  • EO Data Interpretation â€“ Copernicus, NASA, and commercial satellite feeds translated into business insights.
  • Climate & Land Analytics â€“ Visualise deforestation, emissions, and land-use change.
  • Spatial Marketing Intelligence â€“ Integrate geospatial data with performance metrics for hyper-local impact storytelling.
  • Sustainability Benchmarking â€“ Validate ESG claims and monitor environmental baselines.
  • Custom Dashboards & Reports â€“ Interactive dashboards via Power BI, Looker Studio, or Notion.

Tech Stack

  • GIS & EO Analysis: QGIS, ArcGIS, Google Earth Engine

Outcomes

  • Credible, evidence-backed environmental communications
  • Enhanced stakeholder trust
  • Data-driven decision support

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
